import IDirective = ng.IDirective;
 
/**
 * @ngdoc directive
 * @name xui.directive:xuiEmpty
 * @restrict E
 *
 * @description
 * XUI Empty component.
 *
 * @parameters
 * @param {IEmptyData} empty-data Empty data parameters object. Currently available
 * parameters are:
 * @param {EmptyVariant=} [empty-data.preset='emptyDataset'] One of basic empty presets: "dataNotAvailable",
 * "serverUnreachable", "dataNotApplicable", "emptyDataset".
 * In case it is specified, there is no need to indicate other parameters.
 * @param {string=} [empty-data.compact-mode=false] Switch to compact mode without title - type 'B' on mockups
 * https://projects.invisionapp.com/share/9NAGTYRYD#/screens/228007966_Placeholder_Compositions)
 * @param {string=} [empty-data.image='no-data-to-show'] The image to be rendered(xui-image).
 * Able to handle custom paths and default graphics library.
 * @param {string=} [empty-data.title=''] Empty heading text.
 * @param {string=} [empty-data.description='No data to show'] Empty description text.
 * @param {string=} [empty-data.template-url=null] Parameter specifying common URL for custom templates.
 * If none is provided the default template is used
 * @param {IEmptyViewModel=} [empty-data.viewModel={}] Object with data to be passed to the empty controller's scope
 * if custom template is used. Use `ctrl` alias to access the object.
 * The common case is to pass a `searchTerm` string `{{ctrl.viewModel.searchTerm}}`.
 * `IEmptyViewModel` is a generic type, it should be used along with the specified type/interface.
 * For instance, `viewModel: IEmptyViewModel<{searchTerm: string}> = {searchTerm: ""}`
 *
 * @example
 * <example module="xui">
 * <file src="src/components/empty/docs/empty-examples.html" name="index.html"></file>
 * <file src="src/components/empty/docs/empty-examples.js" name="app.js"></file>
 *</example>
 */
export class EmptyDirective implements IDirective {
    public restrict = "E";
    public templateUrl = "xui/components/empty/empty-directive.html";
    public transclude = false;
    public scope = {};
    public bindToController = {
        emptyData: "=?"
    };
    public controller = "xuiEmptyController";
    public controllerAs = "ctrl";
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Fri Dec 15 2017 19:51:34 GMT+0000 (UTC)
